# Vxe Design

A PC-based visual designer based on Vxe UI, used for building zero-code and low-code platforms

## Design of Contents

- [vxe-flow-design API](/#/vxe-flow-design/api)
- [vxe-flow-view API](/#/vxe-flow-view/api)
- [vxe-form-design API](/#/vxe-form-design/api)
- [vxe-form-view API](/#/vxe-form-view/api)
- [vxe-list-design API](/#/vxe-list-design/api)
- [vxe-list-view API](/#/vxe-list-view/api)
